PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Another project called ‘Criminal Database Management System’ was designed to help organize the data around department of Police, Court and Jail. We designed modules for each of these departments using C#.NET as a programming language and Microsoft Access Database. Using this project, employees from Police department can register a case and forward it to court, after which manipulation of records can be done by the Court. If required this data can be forwarded to Jail. We used ‘AES’ encryption to protect data from threats.
This project aimed at generating assembly code from C statements for people who don't know how to write assembly code but want it. The assumption was that people knew C language.
In this project we used "Google Cloud Messaging" service on Android enabled devices to keep user updated with messaging service. This service was using push messaging technology.

1. Analyze current state of snooker game using a captured image from a top mounted camera.
2. Based on player's profile suggest him a best possible shot so as to score maximum and block   the opponent
3. Now when the player actually plays the shot, track his actual played shot using a live feed from a top mounted camera.
4. Calculate the spin, angle and distance errors by comparing it with suggested shot and update the profile using a Machine Learning algorithm.
5. Use the updated profile as a feedback to suggest more personalized shots.

HONOR & AWARD.Title: Qualified for ACM ICPC Asia-Amritapuri regionals 2014
